Description: Ostracon, large section of the body of a red-brown pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and perhaps very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394318) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394318)
